MarkdownBlockBase.code_block:
<% if (!user) { %>

Welcome! Please log in.

Log In <% } else { %>

Hello, <%= user.displayName %>.

Account Info
Log Out <% } %>

<% if (!user) { %>

Welcome! Please log in.

Log In <% } else { %>

displayName: <%= user.displayName %>

givenName: <%= user.name.givenName %>

familyName: <%= user.name.familyName %>

UPN: <%= user._json.upn %>

Profile ID: <%= user.id %>

Full Claimes

<%- JSON.stringify(user) %>

Log Out <% } %>

<% if (!user) { %>

Home | Log In

<% } else { %>

Home | Account | Log Out

<% } %> <%- body %>
